keyword: how many calories in 2 cups of rice
title: How Many Calories Are in 2 Cups of Rice?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in 2 cups of rice, including carbs, protein, fat, full nutrition breakdown per cup, and preparation tweaks for better choices.
h1: How Many Calories Are in 2 Cups of Rice?
assumptions: Cooked long-grain white rice, measured after cooking (~158 g per cup), no added salt, oil, or seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by rice type (white vs. brown), brand, cooking method, and portion size. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: Two cups of cooked white rice contain about 410 calories and 89 grams of carbohydrates.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use jasmine rice (slightly higher carbs per cup)

faqs.q: How many calories in one cup of cooked rice?
faqs.a: About 205 calories for one cup of cooked white rice.

faqs.q: What's the carb content in 2 cups of rice?
faqs.a: Approximately 89 grams of carbohydrates, mostly starch.

faqs.q: Does brown rice have more calories than white?
faqs.a: Slightly moreâ€”around 215 kcal per cup due to higher fiber.

faqs.q: Are these calories for cooked or uncooked rice?
faqs.a: Cooked; uncooked rice has more calories per cup as it expands when cooked.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in rice?
faqs.a: Boiling absorbs water (lower density); frying adds oil and calories.
